ComicInfo.Title: The Giant Robots of Kilgor; Invasion of the Three-Armed Men; The Legend of the Haunted Well; The Silent Explosive; Headless Men of the Gold Comet; The Mad Giant Experimenter; The Problem of Prince Pizga
ComicInfo.Summary:
Space Smith and Dianna are attacked by the Thinker's headless soldiers while they investigate the comet of gold.
Stardust prevents the Mad Giant from destroying Chicago with a volcano that appears in Lake Michigan.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 18:10:41. [Issue ID 691]
